pkgmetadata.longdescription: Bayesian Single Arm Sample Size Calculation Software // Frequentist and Bayesian single arm trial design and sample size software. Designs cover one and two binary endpoints with both single and multi-stage methodology. The research leading to these results has received funding from the European Union Seventh Framework Programme (FP7/2007-2013) under grant agreement number 278742 (Eurosarc).
